issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
*Assessment*

After installing Eucalyptus 4.0 with Equallogic packages, Equallogic backend fails to be set:

{code}
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euca-modify-property -p acme.storage.blockstoragemanager=equallogic
PROPERTY	acme.storage.blockstoragemanager	<unset> was <unset>
{code}

*Signs*

* Following packages are installed on respective components:
{code}
### CLC/OSG/Walrus ###
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# rpm -qa | grep eucalyptus
eucalyptus-4.0.0-0.0.958.20140430git93d59a3e.el6.x86_64
eucalyptus-walrus-4.0.0-0.0.958.20140430git93d59a3e.el6.x86_64
eucalyptus-enterprise-storage-san-equallogic-libs-4.0.0-0.0.953.20140430gitd362d542.el6.x86_64
eucalyptus-common-java-4.0.0-0.0.958.20140430git93d59a3e.el6.x86_64
eucalyptus-cloud-4.0.0-0.0.958.20140430git93d59a3e.el6.x86_64
eucalyptus-osg-4.0.0-0.0.958.20140430git93d59a3e.el6.x86_64
eucalyptus-load-balancer-image-1.0.4-0.198.140429git81659ff.el6.x86_64
eucalyptus-sos-plugins-0.1.5-0.el6.noarch
eucalyptus-common-java-libs-4.0.0-0.0.958.20140430git93d59a3e.el6.x86_64
eucalyptus-admin-tools-4.0.0-0.0.958.20140430git93d59a3e.el6.noarch
eucalyptus-imaging-worker-image-1.0.0-0.156.140430gitc8b320b.el6.x86_64

### CC/SC ###
[root@odc-d-31 ~]# rpm -qa | grep eucalyptus
eucalyptus-4.0.0-0.0.958.20140430git93d59a3e.el6.x86_64
eucalyptus-common-java-4.0.0-0.0.958.20140430git93d59a3e.el6.x86_64
eucalyptus-blockdev-utils-4.0.0-0.0.958.20140430git93d59a3e.el6.x86_64
eucalyptus-common-java-libs-4.0.0-0.0.958.20140430git93d59a3e.el6.x86_64
eucalyptus-admin-tools-4.0.0-0.0.958.20140430git93d59a3e.el6.noarch
eucalyptus-sc-4.0.0-0.0.958.20140430git93d59a3e.el6.x86_64
eucalyptus-enterprise-storage-san-equallogic-libs-4.0.0-0.0.953.20140430gitd362d542.el6.x86_64
eucalyptus-axis2c-common-4.0.0-0.0.958.20140430git93d59a3e.el6.x86_64
eucalyptus-cc-4.0.0-0.0.958.20140430git93d59a3e.el6.x86_64
{code}
* Services Status:
{code}
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euca-describe-services
SERVICE	user-api          	API_55    	API_55               	ENABLED 	23  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/User-API	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_55:user-api:API_55/
SERVICE	autoscaling       	API_55    	API_55.autoscaling   	ENABLED 	23  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/AutoScaling	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_55:autoscaling:API_55.autoscaling/
SERVICE	cloudformation    	API_55    	API_55.cloudformation	ENABLED 	23  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/CloudFormation	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_55:cloudformation:API_55.cloudformation/
SERVICE	cloudwatch        	API_55    	API_55.cloudwatch    	ENABLED 	23  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/CloudWatch	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_55:cloudwatch:API_55.cloudwatch/
SERVICE	compute           	API_55    	API_55.compute       	ENABLED 	23  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/compute	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_55:compute:API_55.compute/
SERVICE	euare             	API_55    	API_55.euare         	ENABLED 	23  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/Euare	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_55:euare:API_55.euare/
SERVICE	loadbalancing     	API_55    	API_55.loadbalancing 	ENABLED 	23  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/LoadBalancing	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_55:loadbalancing:API_55.loadbalancing/
SERVICE	objectstorage     	API_55    	API_55.objectstorage 	ENABLED 	23  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/objectstorage	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_55:objectstorage:API_55.objectstorage/
SERVICE	tokens            	API_55    	API_55.tokens        	ENABLED 	23  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/Tokens	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_55:tokens:API_55.tokens/
SERVICE	cluster           	acme	194-cluster-controller	ENABLED 	23  	http://10.104.1.194:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC	arn:euca:eucalyptus:acme:cluster:194-cluster-controller/

SERVICE	eucalyptus        	eucalyptus	10.104.10.55         	ENABLED 	23  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/Eucalyptus	arn:euca:eucalyptus:::10.104.10.55/
SERVICE	jetty             	eucalyptus	10.104.10.55         	ENABLED 	23  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/Jetty	arn:euca:eucalyptus::jetty:10.104.10.55/
SERVICE	autoscalingbackend	eucalyptus	10.104.10.55         	ENABLED 	23  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/AutoScalingBackend	arn:euca:eucalyptus::autoscalingbackend:10.104.10.55/
SERVICE	cloudwatchbackend 	eucalyptus	10.104.10.55         	ENABLED 	23  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/CloudWatchBackend	arn:euca:eucalyptus::cloudwatchbackend:10.104.10.55/
SERVICE	imaging           	eucalyptus	10.104.10.55         	NOTREADY	23  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/Imaging	arn:euca:eucalyptus::imaging:10.104.10.55/
SERVICE	dns               	eucalyptus	10.104.10.55         	ENABLED 	23  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/Dns	arn:euca:eucalyptus::dns:10.104.10.55/
SERVICE	loadbalancingbackend	eucalyptus	10.104.10.55         	NOTREADY	23  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/LoadBalancingBackend	arn:euca:eucalyptus::loadbalancingbackend:10.104.10.55/
SERVICE	notifications     	eucalyptus	10.104.10.55         	ENABLED 	23  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/Notifications	arn:euca:eucalyptus::notifications:10.104.10.55/
SERVICE	walrusbackend     	walrus    	55-walrus            	ENABLED 	23  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/WalrusBackend	arn:euca:bootstrap:walrus:walrusbackend:55-walrus/
{code}
* Debug message when running euca-modify-property:
{code}
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euca-modify-property -p acmes.storage.blockstoragemanager=equallogic --debug
2014-04-30 06:37:52,190 ModifyPropertyValue [DEBUG]:request_params: {'Name': 'acme.storage.blockstoragemanager', 'Value': 'equallogic'}
2014-04-30 06:37:52,191 ModifyPropertyValue [DEBUG]:Using access key provided by client.

PROPERTY	acme.storage.blockstoragemanager	<unset> was <unset>
{code}

*Pertinent Data*

Sosreport attached. 

*Steps*

* Installed Eucalyptus 4.0 (without installing the eucalyptus-enterprise-storage-san-equallogic-libs initially)
* Registered components respectively
{code}
## CLC ##
- euca_conf --initialize
- euca_conf --register-cluster --partition acme --host 10.104.1.194 --component 194-cluster-controller
- euca_conf --register-sc --partition acme --host 10.104.1.194 --component 194-storage-controller
- euca_conf --register-osg 10.104.10.55
- euca_conf --register-walrusbackend --partition walrus --host 10.104.10.55 --component 55-walrus

## CC ##
- euca_conf --register-nodes 10.105.1.188
{code}
* Tried to set the storage.blockstoragemanager to 'equallogic' and it failed (as it should since the SAN packages are installed).  However I think there should be an error stating that the packages for equallogic SAN are not installed IMO:
{code}
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euca-modify-property -p acme.storage.blockstoragemanager=equallogic
PROPERTY	acme.storage.blockstoragemanager	<unset> was <unset>
{code}
* Installed eucalyptus-enterprise-storage-san-equallogic-libs on following machines, and ran 'service eucalyptus-cloud restart':
** CLC/Walrus/OSG
** CC/SC
* After euca-describe-services returned with services that should be ENABLED, retried to set storage.blockstoragemanager and it failed:
{code}
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euca-modify-property -p acme.storage.blockstoragemanager=equallogic
PROPERTY	acme.storage.blockstoragemanager	<unset> was <unset>
{code}
fields.summary: Equallogic Backend Can't Be Set in Eucalyptus 4.0
fields.environment:
* non-HA
* 1 x CLC/Walrus/OSG
* 1 x SC/CC
* 1 x NC

comments.body:
These machines are in the PRC:

* CLC/Walrus/OSG - 10.104.10.55
* CC/SC - 10.104.1.194
* NC - 10.105.1.188

[Documentation|https://www.eucalyptus.com/docs/eucalyptus/3.4/index.html#install-guide/installing_euca_release.html] followed incorrectly.

Instead of installing eucalyptus-enterprise-storage-san-equallogic, eucalyptus-enterprise-storage-san-equallogic-libs was installed on the SC.

Added KB - [Troubleshooting 'storage.blockstoragemanager' Not Accepting Backend Configuration Changes for Supported SANs|https://support.eucalyptus.com/hc/en-us/articles/201862024-Troubleshooting-storage-blockstoragemanager-Not-Accepting-Backend-Configuration-Changes-for-Supported-SANs]
